customer_addr:
740 N Railroad Ave
New Holland, PA 17557

citations.narrative:
The following guinea pig enclosures had holes with protruding wire above the mineral blocks:
* Row 2, tier 1, both enclosures
* Row 4, tier 1, right enclosure
* Row 5, tier 2, both enclosures
* Row 5, tier 3, both enclosures
* Row 5, tier 4, both enclosures
The protruding wire ends above the mineral blocks can cause injury to the guinea pigs while chewing or licking the blocks.
Primary enclosures must be maintained in good repair to protect guinea pigs from injury. Correct by March 19, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End Section

narrative:
3.28(a)(1) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
The following guinea pig enclosures had holes with protruding wire above the mineral blocks: 
* Row 2, tier 1, both enclosures 
* Row 4, tier 1, right enclosure  
* Row 5, tier 2, both enclosures 
* Row 5, tier 3, both enclosures 
* Row 5, tier 4, both enclosures 
The protruding wire ends above the mineral blocks can cause injury to the guinea pigs while chewing or licking the blocks. 
Primary enclosures must be maintained in good repair to protect guinea pigs from injury. Correct by March 19, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End Section
